tasks: Developing the theory of cyclic flats of q-matroids
methods: Lattice of cyclic flats and their ranks
F_{q^m}-independence of an F_q-subspace of F_q^n
results: Cyclic flats and their ranks uniquely determine a q-matroid
title: The Cyclic Flats of a $q$-Matroid
abstract: In this paper we develop the theory of cyclic flats of $q$-matroids. We show that the lattice of cyclic flats, together with their ranks, uniquely determines a $q$-matroid and hence derive a new $q$-cryptomorphism. We introduce the notion of $\mathbb{F}_{q^m}$-independence of an $\mathbb{F}_q$-subspace of $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ and we show that $q$-matroids generalize this concept, in the same way that matroids generalize the notion of linear independence of vectors over a given field.
